overview: This excellent Cadinot release from 1996 centers around the activities of a photographic agency who gather together a crew of handsome male models for a Paris fashion show. The agency staff of course get to test the sexual ability of each prospective model along the way as every interview and photo shoot ends with rock hard cocks and spurting orgasms. There are a dozen hot sex scenes in Pressbook, plus a final orgy in the dressing room just before the fashion show. Highlights include a blond-haired model who takes an amazing selection of huge dildos and beads up his ass, an extremely well hung black guy, and a handsome hairstylist who works his sexual way through the entire agency to win his place in the show. 105 minutes of pure Cadinot class with fifteen international gorgeous guys, along with the usual superb Cadinot photography.
title: Pressbook
